name: Motherhome
description:
Home is not just a shelter, but the ones we love. But for one little creature, they're one and the same. Venture out into the dangerous world outside to collect and combine FRUITS at your Motherhome to create new family members. Family members will have different stats depending on the fruit combination, so experiment to overcome and build a safe haven for your kind.

Created for the Global Game Jam 2019, based on the theme "What home means to you."

CREDITS:

 Joshua Hedges (Lead Designer, Sound Engineer, Programmer)

Bryan Livingston (Lead Programmer,Designer)

 Nicholas Lives (Artist/Animator,Designer)
